context.p: In the desktop mode, click New Window.

The new window is a duplicate of the original. Any previously visited workspaces are retained from the parent window; use Go back and Go forward to revisit them. Further navigation to other workspaces in either window, however, is independent of the other window.
Note that you can close duplicate windows (click File Close ) or the original; the work session remains active as long as one window is open.
context.note: To view two workspaces at the same time, create a new window. Any changes you make in this or the other window (or windows, if you open more) are saved with the application.

You can set the properties of a workspace to open in a new window automatically whenever it is selected. If you are running the Tivoli Enterprise Portal in browser mode from a browser that is enabled for tabs, the workspace opens in a new tabbed page.
